title: Emily Oster’s Pandemic Parenting Guidance
itunes:title: Emily Oster’s Pandemic Parenting Guidance
description:
Legions of fans are taking their cues from a hyper-rational, best-selling Brown University professor whose version of economics is keeping them sane.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
